label: 大江朝綱
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (886-957). Also known as Nochi no Gō Shoōkō 後江相公 (The Later Ōe State Counsellor"), after his grandfater Otondo 音人 (811-877), the 'real' Gō Shōkoō. "Erudite" of literature. Compositions in Honchō monzui (45). Kanshi in Wakan rōeishū 和漢朗詠集 (29), Shinsen rōeishū 新撰朗詠集 (10), Fusōshū (31), and Sakumon daitai (2). Comp. Wachū setsuin 倭注切韻 (939, lost). [本朝文粋、漢詩、扶桑集、作文大体] "
